description: This indulgent sweet and sticky dessert, is an even more indulgent breakfast.
name: Caramelised Banana French Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, crack and beat the eggs with the milk and vanilla extract and set to one side.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat, add 3 tablespoons of butter with the brown sugar and fry for 3 minutes until the butter and sugar has melted.
Place the sliced bananas into the pan and cook for 2 minutes ensuring the bananas are all equally covered. Then remove from the pan and set to one side.
Now place the bread into the egg mixture and allow to soak up the mixture and flip over to ensure all areas are covered.
Now place some butter onto the pan and fry the French toast for 3 minutes on each side.
Serve the French toast with the caramelised bananas drizzled with maple syrup.
